https://tmrev.io/movie/8273-American Wedding 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pCO3lJv2PzPkJty29APxCVSjyoE.jpg With high school a distant memory, Jim and Michelle are getting married -- and in a hurry, since Jim's grandmother is sick and wants to see him walk down the aisle -- prompting Stifler to throw the ultimate bachelor party. And Jim's dad is reliable as ever, doling out advice no one wants to hear. American Wedding
